projects.title: Younique CMS
projects.description: Built an innovative Drupal-powered CMS for Younique using PHP, which cut content creation, scheduling, and testing time by 50%. Click the link below to see an example page powered by the CMS.

projects.title: YouTube Audio Filtering
projects.description: For our Capstone Project, my partner and I built a Google Chrome extension called YouTube Audio Filtering, that allows users to filter swearwords out of YouTube videos.
